Name: The Mazant
Description: Polished 1880s guesthouse near the French Quarter featuring stylish rooms & a 125-year-old oak tree.

Name: Auld Sweet Olive Bed and Breakfast
Description: Nature-themed rooms in an airy 1850s Creole house offering a courtyard with olive trees & a hammock.

Name: The Cornstalk Hotel
Description: Refined hotel set in an elegant 1816 mansion offering plush rooms with antique furnishings.

Name: Bourbon Orleans Hotel
Description: Elegant hotel offering an outdoor pool, a Creole restaurant & a bar with live entertainment.

Name: Lafitte Hotel and Bar
Description: Antiques-furnished rooms & suites, some with balconies, in a restored 1849 home with an art gallery.

Name: The Lookout Inn of New Orleans
Description: Quirky, colorful guesthouse suites, offering free WiFi & minifridges, plus outdoor saltwater pool.

Name: Lamothe House Hotel
Description: Refined 1839 hotel offering rooms & suites with low-key or Victorian decor, plus an outdoor pool.

Name: TownePlace Suites New Orleans Harvey/West Bank
Description: Laid-back extended-stay hotel offering free breakfast, Wi-Fi & parking, plus an outdoor pool.

Name: Historic Mardi Gras Inn
Description: Relaxed hotel offering basic rooms & suites, plus continental breakfast & shared courtyards.

Name: Omni Riverfront Hotel
Description: Upscale rooms with 42-inch TVs, coffeemakers & Wi-Fi, plus bistro/bar & a fitness center.

Name: Roomza New Orleans at Melrose Mansion
Description: Contemporary rooms & suites in a Gothic-style Victorian mansion, plus a gym & an outdoor pool.

Name: Soniat House
Description: Refined old-world hotel set in French Colonial houses dating from the 1800s, plus free gym access.

Name: Andrew Jackson Hotel , a French Quarter Inns hotel
Description: Classic townhouse hotel with relaxed rooms & a quaint courtyard, plus free Wi-Fi & breakfast.

Name: Hotel Peter and Paul
Description: Upmarket hotel in an 1860 church & school with refined rooms, a chic bar & free Wi-Fi.

Name: New Orleans RV Resort & Marina
Description: Casual resort with an RV park, a marina, rental villas, dining, a pool & a French Quarter shuttle.

Name: ONE11 Hotel
Description: Sophisticated quarters, some with terraces, in a hip hotel offering a polished bistro/bar & a pool.

Name: The Mansion on Royal Street
Description: Elegant B&B set in an 1850s Greek Revival house offering traditional rooms & continental breakfast.
